entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late this evening then clearing. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
